titles.title: Safeguarding Department of Veterans Affairs Dependent Education Benefits Act of 2023
Safeguarding Department of Veterans Affairs Dependent Education Benefits Act of 2023
A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to reinstate entitlement to Post-9/11 Educational Assistance for victims of sexual assault or domestic violence, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
